casebody.data:
NEUSOFT MEDICAL SYSTEMS, USA, Inc., et al.
v.
NEUISYS, LLC, et al. No. 288P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of August 2015 by North Carolina Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
